alert.note: Alert for Avoyelles (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 8:48AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Avoyelles Parish through 915 AM CST... At 848 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cottonport, or near Moreauville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Marksville, Bunkie, Simmesport, Moreauville, Bordelonville, Cottonport, Mansura, Hessmer, Evergreen, Plaucheville, Lake Ophelia National Wildlife Refuge, Dupont, Big Bend and Hamburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
